Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023.bases

package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023.bases

Component interfaces for the household energy manager project.

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to provide a basic household management systems as an example of a cyber-physical system.

This package defines the component interfaces to be used in the household energy manager project. The household energy manager is a BCM4Java component which requires these generic component interfaces to connect to and control electrical equipments.

  • Class
    Description
    AdjustableCI
    The component interface AdjustableCI defines the standardised operation that an equipment implements to let a household energy manager adjust or suspend them i.e., making their electric power consumption the lowest possible.
    NotProvidedOperationException
    The class NotProvidedOperationException defines the exception thrown by equipments when they do not implement some operation appearing in the equipment control component interfaces.
    RegistrationCI
    The component interface RegistrationCI defines the registration service of home energy managers that allows digital electric equipments to register for their remote control.
